messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will take action to protect frontline NHS services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reform the whole electoral system by introducing proportional representation, an elected House of Lords, fixed term parliaments, and ensuring all parties experience fair UK taxes. Promises to give power to the people by taking it away from central government and give power back to local communities.

Commit to local, national and international action to sustain life on Earth by protecting biodiversity and promoting clean non-nuclear energy and a low carbon economy. Supports technology transfer to help developing countries, ensuring every area of policy includes action to help the planet.
Nick Clegg's tax plan means no tax on the first £10,000 you earn, reducing most tax bills by £700.

issues.health: The Lib Dem difference protects frontline NHS services.

quotes.text: Spending squeeze for NHS despite Darling's promise

images.caption: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Image captions include endorsements from Nick Clegg and emphasis on support across Britain, as well as specific policy points such as fairer taxes and climate change. The leaflet also criticizes the opposition leadership's track record.
